channel.title: [DELTA] Welcome Interface [/DELTA]
channel.description:
I'm trying to create a Welcome Interface that looks like the one below [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1ilrt3.png[/img] Only problem is I have no experience with interfaces and how they work I just simply need this ones code, and where to put the code. (I'll also need to know how to make it popup when a new user joins)
Delta Based 317
Thank you!

item.title: [DELTA] Welcome Interface [/DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:2, topic:511851”]I Need to know this too.
for the popup make a method that show this interface, after you done this, add this in initialize method :
yourMethodName();
should be something like this:
public void yourMethodName(){
showInterface(interfaceID);
}
Now only one thing to make the interface (With id’s), sorry i dont know how to do this on delta i need to know this too.[/quote]
The fuck? He doesn’t need a method in his initialize for a welcome interface.
he just needs the code to show an interface (don’t know it for delta).
There’s no method needed.
You’re thinking about what needs to be done client sided.
Step 1: make the sprites.

Read full topic
